concept.title: Installation overview
concept.shortdesc: Overview of the installation processes for Windows, Linux, and Mac OS. Key sections: required tools, optional tools, and things to consider before installing.

prolog.author: Jen Linton
JoAnn Hackos
Kylene Bruski
Anna van Raaphorst
Richard Johnson
prolog.publisher: OASIS (Organization for the Advancement of Structured Information Standards)
